mapper.sql: id, customer_name, customer_codename, tel, email, address, createtime

mapper.update:
update customer
customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_codename = #{customerCodename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update customer set customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_codename = #{customerCodename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from customer
customer_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and tel=#{tel}
order by createtime desc
